attributes.action: Relay Railway Lines benefit the ecomomy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Irish Government is re-opening the West of Ireland line, linking Cork-Limerick-Galway and eventually Sligo. Given the fact that shopping and tourism is ever popular along the Northern Ireland border, surely it is time relay the railway line to Enniskillen from Sligo.
attributes.creator_name: Frank Nicholas Adam B.Sc. Transport Management

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
